 2010-02482010-03-10,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActGeneral Campaign Star and General Service Medal Regulations, 2009
SubjectOrder Awarding of the General Campaign Star with the ALLIED FORCE ribbon
PrecisOrder (a) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2004-753 of June 17, 2004; (b) determining who has rendered service that is worthy of recognition by the award of to the General Campaign Star with the ALLIED FORCE ribbon(fighter pilots and crew members); and (c) establishing its order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2010-0019 Publication Date: 2010-03-31
AttachmentsAttachment
